GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
kcm: close race conditions on sk_receive_queue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit 4154b6afa2bd639214ff259d912faad984f7413a, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit ab7ac4eb9832e32a09f4e8042705484d2fb0aad3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kcm: close race conditions on sk_receive_queue
